Name: Ice 'T' Knee
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honeyed palate topped off with tannin and jasmine.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly (Simon Difford), London, England
Nutrition: One serving of Ice 'T' Knee contains 196 calories
